mapper.select: select b.no, b.title, u.name, date_format(b.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as regDate, b.hit, b.group_no as groupNo, b.order_no as orderNo, b.depth, b.user_no as userNo from board b, user u where b.user_no=u.no order by b.group_no desc, b.no asc limit #{startRowNumber }, #{postCountPerPage }
select no, title, contents, hit, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as regDate, group_no as groupNo, order_no as orderNo, depth, user_no as userNo from board order by no desc
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title }, contents = #{contents } where no=#{no }
mapper.insert: insert into board select null, #{title }, #{contents }, 0, now(), COALESCE(max(group_no+1), 1), 1, 0, #{userNo } from board
